actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: To direct the Administrator of the Small Business Administration and the Administrator of General Services to make rules to streamline and simplify the registration system used by small business concerns, and for other purposes.
short_title: Open Government Technology Work to More Businesses Act

titles.title: Open Government Technology Work to More Businesses Act

To direct the Administrator of the Small Business Administration and the Administrator of General Services to make rules to streamline and simplify the registration system used by small business concerns, and for other purposes.
